# Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and
# files generated by popular IDEs and editors

# Ignore solution and project files
*.sln
*.csproj
*.vbproj
*.fsproj
*.xcodeproj
*.swiftpm

# Ignore Visual Studio Code workspace settings
.vscode/

# Ignore JetBrains Rider files
.idea/

# Ignore Rider settings
*.suo
*.user
*.sln.dotSettings.user

# Ignore nuget packages
*.nuget.props
*.nuget.targets
packages/

# Ignore Xamarin specific files
*.apk
*.ap_
*.aab
*.dylib
*.dll
*.jar
*.so

# Ignore build output directories
/bin/
/obj/
